p: The entomological survey was mainly focused on the collection of adult dengue vector mosquitoes and identification of their breeding places. In total, 10,616 potential breeding places were observed and 2,718 female adult dengue vector mosquitoes were collected during the entomological survey. All the reported mosquito breeding places for immature stages of dengue vector mosquitoes in the control area were positive for Ae. albopictus and none of them were positive for Ae. aegypti.
